description: A React component named ListingForm that provides a reusable form interface for creating and editing listings. It manages form state for listing properties such as title, price, currency, region, category, condition, description, images, and optional UUIDs for region and category. It includes functionalities to add/remove images dynamically and handles form submission.

methods.name: ListingForm({ initial = {}, onSubmit, submitting = false })
methods.description: React functional component that renders a form for listing data input, with state management for form fields and image handling, and handles form submission.

search-terms: UUID input for region and category

ctags.name: ListingForm
ctags.pattern: /^export default function ListingForm({ initial = {}, onSubmit, submitting = false }) {$/
